name: Evader (MohamedA.G)
description:
Introduction

Evade the traps whilst you are trying to run away from the ever-growing beast. Who or what is that beast? Perhaps it is your fear? Your greed? Your lust? Who knows? And who cares? Just run away! While you're running away from the beast, try and get a high score so you can impress your friends and family and finally make them proud of you on...something, just anything.
